actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

official_title: To establish a chronic care improvement demonstration program for Medicaid beneficiaries with severe mental illnesses.
short_title: Mental Illness Chronic Care Improvement Act of 2009

summary.text: Mental Illness Chronic Care Improvement Act of 2009 - Directs the Secretary of Health and Human Services to enter into chronic care improvement program operator agreements with applicant states to provide for the development, testing, evaluation, and implementation of severe mental illness chronic care improvement demonstration programs.

titles.title: Mental Illness Chronic Care Improvement Act of 2009
To establish a chronic care improvement demonstration program for Medicaid beneficiaries with severe mental illnesses.
